metadata.title: CVE-2020-11722 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup (aka DCSS or crawl) before 0.25 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via Lua bytecode embedded in anuploaded .crawlrc file.

criterions.comment: crawl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
